question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. laptop
B. parking meter
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The parking meter is in the foreground, partially obscuring the view of the car and bicycle, while the laptop is visible through the window inside the cafe, clearly farther away.
